title: Strengthening Programming Practical Skills: Interactive Comic Learning for Digital Citizenship Competency

context.prior_knowledge: Basic internet usage skills and experience in smartphone application
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can recognize conflict situations arising during online interactions and explain at least three appropriate problem-solving strategies.
Learners can create and submit a personal action plan to enhance resilience in digital environments.
Learners can propose practical ways to fulfill the role of a responsible citizen in cyberspace (e.g., information sharing, respecting others) through team discussions and role-playing.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
